content: Currently, Working with Dr. Mengling ‘Mornin’ Feng on skin cancer analysis using deep learning. I am also working with Dr. Anil Kumar Tiwari on Segmentation of left atrium cavity in patients affected by atrial fibrillation. Previously, i had an opportunity of woking with Dr. Aditya Nigam on application of deep learning in biometrics.

title: Shreshth Saini
